author: Fox News
title: AnnaLynne McCord criticized over Vladimir Putin ‘If I was your mother’ poem amid Russia-Ukraine crisis
description: The "90210" star is being criticized for her poem to Russian President Vladimir Putin informing him of all the things she would have done "if I was your mother."
content:
Actress AnnaLynne McCord is receiving criticism for her commentary on the crisis concerning Russias invasion of Ukraine.
The "90210" star of the CW variety sent a tweet on Thursday that sees her rec… [+4199 chars]
